title: Best of The Program |  Guests: Bill O’Reilly, Rep. Thomas Massie, & Stephen Moore | 4/29/21
description:
Rep. Thomas Massie calls in to discuss how schizophrenic and radical President Biden’s address to Congress was and the future of a Biden economy. Is the computer chip shortage dire? Bill O’Reilly joins a day early to comb through all the unrealistic things President Biden proposed in his speech. Economist Stephen Moore shares his insight on Biden’s atrocious spending proposals and the massive inflation they’ll cause.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
